fields.text: You're about to recall action discs and start a new round. Are you sure?

clickRoutine.note: Get player count 1/3 - select player seats
Get player count 2/3 - filter out empty seats
Get player count 3/3 - count remaining seats

clickRoutine.notes: get the activeFace and set it as a new variable
Increase round number; if round 3, remove 1 action disc per player

clickRoutine: var result =  ${num1} + ${num2} // You could also write this as var result = + ${num1} {num2}

thenRoutine.note: Remove one action disc per player for the last round

info.name: Marble Mania
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.
The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:

* Quarry Tile: https://www.freepik.com/icon/steel_18362170 * Rock Rubble: https://www.freepik.com/icon/rock_10135735 * Rotate Arrow: https://www.freepik.com/icon/rotate-arrow_10697520
* Star In Hand: https://www.freepik.com/icon/star_6562948

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:
* Allied Star: https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/allied-star.html * Diamong Ring: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/diamond-ring.html
* Mine Wagon: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/mine-wagon.html
info.description: Build temples and expand cities on a Greek island, mining marble along the way to glorify your work!
info.helpText:
Some notes on various implementation features:

* To build pillars at a temple, click on the temple tile multiple times until it shows the correct number of pillars

* To indicate who the first player next round should be, click on the star icon on the slider until it shows the correct player color

* To draw quarry tiles, drag-and-drop the tiles out of the quarry tiles holder in General Supply

* To add up your victory points (VPs) at the end, click the Show VPs button which displays a new counter at each player's seat

label-endgame-scoring-content.text:
Largest city per player:
+1 VP per palace, 
house, tile in that city


 Each city adjacent to a temple: +1 VP per pillar in that temple


Each city adjacent to a statue: +3 VP per statue


Each ring: +2 VP
Most rings: +3 VP


Remaining marble:
+1 VP per five marble

DealDiscsRoutine.note: Deal players their discs for the new game

fields.text: You're about to reset the game for 2 players. Are you sure?

2pRoutine.note: Get player count 1/3 - select player seats
Get player count 2/3 - filter out empty seats
Get player count 3/3 - count remaining seats
Deal the quarry worker onto a random inland quarry tile
Set all players' starting marble to 10, and starting scores to 0, and VPs display to false

fields.text: You're about to reset the game for 3-4 players. Are you sure?

3-4pRoutine.note: Get player count 1/3 - select player seats
Get player count 2/3 - filter out empty seats
Get player count 3/3 - count remaining seats
Deal the quarry worker onto a random inland quarry tile
Set all players' starting marble to 10, and starting scores to 0, and VPs display to false
